wz:custom.visible: (customersupport_backoffice_addressForm.title != null) AND !#empty(customersupport_backoffice_addressForm.addressLine1) AND !#empty(customersupport_backoffice_addressForm.town) AND (customersupport_backoffice_addressForm.country != null) AND !#empty(customersupport_backoffice_addressForm.postalcode) AND (customersupport_backoffice_addressForm.shippingAddress == true || customersupport_backoffice_addressForm.billingAddress == true)
wz:custom.label: customersupport_backoffice_addressForm_wizard_done
Create
wz:custom.visible: !#empty(auditReportWizardData.reportName) AND !#empty(auditReportWizardData.auditReportConfig) AND auditReportWizardData.sourceItem != null AND auditReportWizardData.auditReportTemplate != null
